pages.text: When reaching a certain level of Irradiation, severe side effects are afflicted
pages.title: Exemplified Irradiation

pages.text:
Side effects are as follows
Weakness, Hunger, Nausea, Slowness, (if Alex's Mobs is present) Exsanguination
Allows the dropping of explosives when airborne, with a Flint and Steel on the offhand
pages.title: Kirov Reporting!

pages.text:
Usable explosives are as follows
 TNT, TNT Minecarts, Nuclear Bombs, Gamma Nuclear Bombs, (if Alex's Caves: Enriched is present) Bombs from Enriched
Hazmat Armor resists radiation sources better
pages.title: Armored Liquidators

pages.text: Improves Rayguns to be more destructive, (compatible with Alex's Caves: Enriched's Mk. II version)
pages.title: Rearayngement

pages.text: Douse yourself in water to reduce Irradiation, (if Supplementaries present) you can use soap to further wash off such
pages.title: Irradiation Washoff

pages.text: Effects those on top of Geothermal Vents based on the liquid that is being spewed
pages.title: Geothermal Effects
